result.detailedDescription: Online retailer offering a range of baby, kids, and maternity products. The platform offers products such as toys, diapers, clothes, footwear, strollers, car seats, and nursery furniture through its website and mobile app. It provides products and also expert-validated parenting and pregnancy advice and tools.
result.shortDescription: Online retailer offering a range of baby, kids, and maternity products
result.name: FirstCry

result.detailedDescription: Showroomprive is an online shopping platform for multi-category products. The product catalog includes clothing, innerwear & fashion accessories like scarves, cosmetics, toys and household products. The members-only platform provides discounts on the products, valid for limited time periods.
result.shortDescription: Online shopping platform for multi-category products
result.name: Showroomprive.com

result.detailedDescription: Cloud-based precision additive manufacturing systems and nano inks for electronics. Its offerings include a desktop 3D printing system for multilayer PCBs and a precision additive manufacturing system for design validation and production of precision components. Its features include precise inkjet deposition, multi-material 3D printing, 3D optimization software, and design flexibility. It also offers conductive nano-silver inks and nano-engineered insulating and substrate inks that can be fed into the unit. Its machine is used to print computers and smartphones.
result.shortDescription: Cloud-based precision additive manufacturing systems and nano inks for electronics
result.name: Nano Dimension

result.detailedDescription: Anomali is a provider of cyber threat intelligence solutions. The products focus on mining, normalization, integration, and validation of threat data. It validates and scores any threat data into actionable intelligence that can be consumed by enterprise risks and threat management platforms such as HP ArcSight, IBM Q1, Nitro Security SIEM, and RSA Archer. The clients of the company include BLACKHAWK, UBISOFT, AIR CANADA, CERTFin, etc.
result.shortDescription: Provider of cyber threat intelligence solutions
result.name: Anomali

Core product: Enterprise-grade Gen AI platform for contact centers (AI agents, agent assist, conversation intelligence).
AI centrality: Core platform relies on Gen AI agents, real-time assist, and conversation intelligence.
Proprietary AI tech: Proprietary "Opera" AI orchestration engine, fine-tuning of 20+ models, conversational AI patents.
Moat / defensibility: Proprietary AI tech, patents, Forrester recognition, customer testimonials, AI-driven revenue.

result.detailedDescription: Cresta provides productivity tools for contact center agents. It offers AI-based tools for real-time coaching, automating workflows, and agent performance management & analysis. It allows automating repetitive tasks such as order entry, lead creation or account validation, and tracks overall sales performance including close rate and number of cases. Intuit, Cox, Nature, and Harward Business Review are some of its clients.
result.shortDescription: Real time AI guidance for contact center agents
result.name: Cresta

result.detailedDescription: Developer of machine vision offerings for industrial robots and production tracking. The product offering for machine vision is named In-Sight which provides high-speed image acquisition and processing for industrial purposes. It provides the necessary software that works alongside the sensor for system validation. The Cognex Connect application allows communication and integration of the system with any robot or PLC.
result.shortDescription: Developer of machine vision offerings for industrial robots and production tracking
result.name: Cognex

result.detailedDescription: Provider of hardware, software, and services for test and measurement. The company offers solutions across industries, including aerospace, electronics, energy, and transportation. Its products support design, validation, and production phases. The company provides various hardware, software, and related services.
result.shortDescription: Provider of hardware, software, and services for test and measurement

result.detailedDescription: AI-powered platform for CPG innovation, trend discovery, and product development. It is a SaaS platform that helps consumer packaged goods brands discover emerging trends in real-time, create new product concepts, and virtually validate them. The platform offers solutions for marketing, R&D innovation, and consumer insights, catering to various industries like flavor and fragrance houses, and ingredient companies. It provides tools like Foresight Engine, Concept Genie, Screen Winner, FoodGPT, and Brand SAY to monitor brand equity and accelerate innovation. The platform uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to provide data-driven insights for faster, cost-effective brand discovery, launch, and growth. It helps in innovation, renovation, and optimizing product portfolios. The platform offers resources like blogs, reports, webinars, and case studies. It is a cloud based platform that offers subscription based services.

result.detailedDescription: Provider of synbiotic supplements and fermented products for gut health. It offers a range of products addressing various health concerns, including weight management, bloating, constipation, and immune support. These products utilize clinically validated probiotic strains formulated for optimal gut survival. The company also provides educational resources on gut health and offers expert consultations. Product lines include daily probiotics, prebiotic fibers, super bundles, detox shots, and fermented foods like kombucha and kefir.

result.detailedDescription: Platform offering prismatic lithium-ion cells for mobility and energy storage. It focuses on cell design and manufacturing for various applications. result.detailedDescription: Cyber risk management platform to validate an organizations cybersecurity process and technology. The company was founded in 2015 by experts from the US Cyber Command and MITs Lincoln Laboratory, SimSpace combines the highest fidelity cyber ranges and attack content with user and adversary emulation techniques. It also provides individual training exercises, attack simulations, mission rehearsals, and product evaluations that leverage its cyber range, SimSpace delivers quantitative and actionable insights into how an organization can protect critical assets against lethal cyber threats.

It facilitates pre and post-claim process along with the underwriting, tracking, validation, auditing and expense management. It provides AI-based automated products- appraisal, transactions, rental & asset management platform and software platform. It also offers a digital payment solution for claims disbursements.

result.detailedDescription: Developer of T -cell-based immunotherapies for the treatment of cancer. The company has propriety platform XPRESIDENT is involved in identifying and validating antigens specific to cancer cells and subsequently develops adoptive cell therapies and bispecific TCRs for treating cancer. IMA101, using its proprietary ACTolog approach, which is T-cell products generated from peripheral blood cells with defined target selectivity.
result.shortDescription: Developer of T -cell-based immunotherapies for the treatment of cancer
result.name: Immatics

result.detailedDescription: Developer of therapeutics for cancer and severe respiratory infections. It is a biopharmaceutical company focused on developing epithelial-mesenchymal transition inhibitors to treat aggressive cancers. It is using its own proprietary suite of complimentary technologies CellSelect used to identify and validate novel drug targets and biomarkers. Its lead product is BGB324, an Axl kinase inhibitor is in clinical trials for patients with Acute myeloid leukemia.
result.shortDescription: Developer of therapeutics for cancer and severe respiratory infections

result.detailedDescription: Exicure (formerly AuraSense Therapeutics) develops a new class of immunomodulatory and gene silencing drugs against validated targets. It uses spherical nucleic acid (SNA) technology platform to build a pipeline of products for a range of diseases. The company's drug can be used for oncology (solid tumours), immunology (Psoriasis, Inflammatory disorders).
result.shortDescription: developer of gene silencing & immunomodulatory drugs using spherical nucleic acid (SNA) technology
result.name: Exicure

result.detailedDescription: AmpliFund is a cloud-based grant management software for the government. The product is offered for grant seekers to track grant opportunities, funds, goals, planning, execution management, etc., for grantmakers to execute grant progress, automate review process, managing rewards, publish & collect applications, etc., and for grant lifecycle management solution with features as planning program goals, collect & validate the application, monitor grant performance, etc. The product is used by the state government, the federal government, local government, nonprofits, and educational institutions.
result.shortDescription: Cloud-based grant management software for government
result.name: AmpliFund

result.detailedDescription: Developer of a transnational research platform for biomarker analysis. The company's proprietary product includes RNAscope technology that is capable of detecting and quantifying RNA biomarkers in situ at single-molecule sensitivity. The company also provides clinical-grade assay development and biomarker analysis services to speed up biomarker validation and companion diagnostic development services. The company's technology platform helps in the development of targeted therapies for cancer and other diseases. Its product portfolio includes RNAscope probes, reagent kits, hybridization systems, and software.
result.shortDescription: Developer of a transnational research platform for biomarker analysis
result.name: ACD

result.detailedDescription: HealthTech Analytics and Validation platform. A health information technology company delivering pharmacy data validation, analytics, and pricing solutions through a SaaS platform. Truveris products include TruGuard (claim validation), TruBid (online auction and RFP tool), and TruReport (prescription claim analytics). They also have a product called rxDash RxDash which is a pharmacy plan modeling, pricing, and reporting solution that helps to give everyone on the pharmaceutical continuum to see the impacts of pricing changes quickly and transparently. Truveris is backed by New Leaf Venture Partners, Tribeca Venture Partners, New Atlantic Ventures, and First Round Capital.
result.shortDescription: HealthTech Analytics and Validation platform
result.name: Truveris

result.detailedDescription: Provider of multichannel commerce solution for eCommerce. It offers SaaS for product content integration, optimization, and distribution in commerce. Its offering includes feed management, marketplace integration, vendor onboarding and product content syndication. The platform allows brands and retailers to validate and manage product content for retail and digital channels.
result.shortDescription: Provider of multichannel commerce solution for eCommerce
result.name: Productsup

result.detailedDescription: Provider of product information management and content syndication platform. The platform centralizes product data, enabling efficient management and collaboration. It facilitates multichannel content syndication, validating data for various selling channels. The platform allows users to activate products on channels, ensuring consistent product information. It integrates with ERP systems and spreadsheets for data import and validation.
result.shortDescription: Provider of product information management and content syndication platform
result.name: Venzee

result.detailedDescription: Developer of antibody-drug-conjugates for cancer treatment. It offers a lead product TGW101 that targets TAG72, a non-internalizing clinically validated pan-carcinoma target, present in several solid tumors. It also offersolid-tumor-targeted ADCs as well as radiopharmaceuticals including a HER2-targeted radioimmunotherapeutic.
result.shortDescription: Developer of antibody-drug-conjugates for cancer treatment
result.name: Tagworks Pharmaceuticals

result.detailedDescription: Crop supply intelligence SaaS platform for sustainable food and beverage supply chains. It empowers food and beverage enterprises to drive environmental impact and ensure supply chain resilience. The cloud-based platform transforms on-ground and satellite data into actionable insights, enabling businesses to measure, validate, and improve their environmental performance while maintaining visibility into their crop supply. It helps organizations streamline ESG reporting, achieve regulatory compliance, and make data-driven decisions that balance sustainability goals with supply chain optimization. Leveraging augmented data, AI/ML, and data analytics, it empowers food and beverage enterprises with real-time analytics and predictive insights that transform intuition-based procurement into data-driven sourcing strategies, ensuring both sustainability and supply chain resilience. The platform is designed to accommodate diverse regions and environmental practices, effectively channeling corporate sustainability standards from headquarters directly to the source of production where impact happens.
result.shortDescription: Crop supply intelligence SaaS platform for sustainable food and beverage supply chains
result.name: AgriTask

result.detailedDescription: Reference checking and CV validation solutions provider. Recruiters create a request using the provided templates, and candidates submit the referee data along with their IDs and past employment details. The nominated referees are notified and invited to validate credentials and answer a questionnaire about the candidate. Candidate feedback is then analyzed and presented back in a report to the recruiter. Supports integrations with Zapier, Taleo, Checkr, Lever, Snaphire, and more. The product is available on a subscription basis.
result.shortDescription: Reference checking and CV validation solutions provider
